message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than $100. Would you like to proceed with purchasing it at this special introductory price?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. I would like to counteroffer at $110.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the high demand for our product, I would like to propose an offer of $120. This reflects the value we see in the product and could be considered a fair compromise.
